about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, P.E. Analytics Limited provides Real Estate Business Intelligence and Analytics Platform. The company owns and operates PropEquity which is an online subscription-based real estate data and analytics platform covering over 1,36,153 projects of 42,231 developers across over 44 cities in India with 13+years of catalog data.

P.E. Analytics Limited offers Real-Estate Business Intelligence - Residential & Commercial, Research & Consulting, Collateral Risk Management, Advanced Processing Facility, Realty Indices, and Catchment Area Analysis services to various users like Developers, Construction industry, Investors, Banks, Housing finance companies, Equity research firms, real estate PE funds, REIT's, Financial institutions, Mortgage insurers, HNIs, Lenders, and Investors in real estate.

The company platform is the only online search platform for real-time data and analytics for the Indian Real Estate Industry.

The company has offices in Gurgaon, Mumbai, and Bangalore.

Competitive Strength:

  1. Strong Database
  2. High-End Technology
  3. Efficient and Talented Team
  4. Market Leadership
  5. Client Engagement
  6. Esteemed Clientele

faqs.question: What is the p e-analytics-ipo?
faqs.answer:
p e-analytics-ipo is a SME IPO of 2772000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹31.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹114 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on March 22, 2022, and closes on March 25, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in p e-analytics-ipo through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in p e-analytics-ipo using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in p e-analytics-ipo by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in p e-analytics-ipo through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'p e-analytics-ipo' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When p e-analytics-ipo will open?
faqs.answer: The p e-analytics-ipo opens on March 22, 2022 and closes on March 25, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of p e-analytics-ipo?
faqs.answer: p e-analytics-ipo lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,36,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for p e-analytics-ipo?
faqs.answer: You can apply in p e-analytics-ipo online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is p e-analytics-ipo allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for p e-analytics-ipo will be done on Wednesday, March 30, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, April 1, 2022. Check the p e-analytics-ipo allotment status.

faqs.question: When is p e-analytics-ipo listing date?
faqs.answer: The p e-analytics-ipo listing date is on Monday, April 4, 2022.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The p e-analytics-ipo is subscribed 46.34 times on March 25 2022 5:47:00 PM (Day 4). The public issue subscribed 59.2 times in the retail category 13.22 times in the QIB category and 126.4 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
